FuncDef:
The verbose command enables the verbose mode for FTP.
The undo verbose command disables the verbose mode for FTP. The verbose command enables the verbose mode for FTP. The undo verbose command disables the verbose mode for FTP. By default, the verbose mode is enabled.
ExtraInfo: When you use the verbose command, all FTP response is displayed. After the file is transmitted, it displays the statistics of transmission rate.
